thread.title: Media Services Manager - Sports Media

title: Media Services Manager - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Media Services Manager   The Media Services Manager is responsible for the day to day management of the departmental personnel as well as delivery of services to internal and external clients.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
